org.apache.gearpump.cluster.worker

Interface ExecutorProcessLauncher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExecutorProcessLauncher

    public interface ExecutorProcessLauncher
    ExecutorProcessLauncher is used to launch a process for Executor using given parameters.

    User can implement this interface to decide the behavior of launching a process. Set "gearpump.worker.executor-process-launcher" to your implemented class name.

      • config

      • createProcess

        RichProcess createProcess(int appId,
                          int executorId,
                          Resource resource,
                          com.typesafe.config.Config config,
                          java.lang.String[] options,
                          java.lang.String[] classPath,
                          java.lang.String mainClass,
                          java.lang.String[] arguments)
        This function launches a process for Executor using given parameters.

        Parameters:
        appId - The appId of the executor to be launched
        executorId - The executorId of the executor to be launched
        resource - The resource allocated for that executor
        options - The command options
        classPath - The classpath of the process
        mainClass - The main class of the process
        arguments - The rest arguments
        config - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

        This function will clean resources for a launched process.
        Parameters:

        executorId - The executorId of launched executor
